content:
Hi all , Is there any tool that is currently available to create sample FHIR instance level resources from an Implementation guide? I am looking for a tool that can import IG files, create sample instances based on user inputted values and finally organize them in a JSON bundle.
I have tried the 'Scenario builder' in Clinfhir where you can create individual resources that can be combined to a bundle , is there any other tool out there with similar functionalities?
Thanks!
http://docs.smarthealthit.org/fred/ is pretty low level but does some of what you're asking about
